trans-unit.source: Represents a window that supports content navigation.
trans-unit.target: Representa una ventana que admite la navegación de contenido.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> derives from <xref:System.Windows.Window> and extends it with the ability to navigate to and display content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> se deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Window> y amplía la capacidad de navegar y mostrar el contenido.

trans-unit.source: Content can be any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: El contenido puede ser cualquier [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] objeto o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] archivo.

trans-unit.source: In general, however, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> object is the preferred way to package content for navigation.
trans-unit.target: En general, sin embargo, un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> objeto es la mejor manera de empaquetar el contenido para la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> property with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Puede navegar a contenido estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> propiedad con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] para el contenido deseado.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method:
trans-unit.target: Además, se puede navegar contenido mediante el uso de una de las sobrecargas siguientes de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> método:

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> will return an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se navega al contenido por [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> devolverá un objeto que contiene el contenido.

trans-unit.source: Navigation by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] also supports navigation to a content fragment.
trans-unit.target: Navegación por [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] también admite la navegación a un fragmento de contenido.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts an object:
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, se puede navegar contenido mediante uno de los <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> sobrecargas de método que acepta un objeto:

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events:
trans-unit.target: Puede realizar el seguimiento de la duración de una navegación a través de los siguientes eventos:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: No todos los eventos se generan cada vez que tenga lugar la navegación; el conjunto de eventos que se produzcan se determina por el tipo de navegación que se produce (contenido o fragmento del contenido) y cómo se completa la navegación (cancelada, detenido o con errores).

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire:
trans-unit.target: La ilustración siguiente muestra la secuencia en la que se desencadenarán estos eventos:

trans-unit.source: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagrama de flujo de navegación de página](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "diagrama de flujo de navegación de página")

trans-unit.source: During or after a navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Durante o después de una exploración, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> proporciona información acerca del contenido que se navega, incluido el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido que se navega (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>), el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido actual (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A>) y un objeto que contiene el contenido que se navegó (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>).

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se navega al, contenido <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> graba la navegación como una entrada en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se agrega una entrada al historial de navegación de retroceso cuando se produce una nueva navegación, mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> método, o yendo a una entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se agrega una entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás, vaya a una entrada en la parte posterior historial de navegación, mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward%2A> notificar si hay entradas en la parte posterior y el historial de navegación hacia atrás, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> automatically displays a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] that allows users to navigate back and forwards through navigation history.
trans-unit.target: La primera vez que una parte del contenido se abrirá desde otra parte del contenido, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> muestra automáticamente una navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] que permite a los usuarios navegue hacia atrás y hacia delante a través del historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: You can configure when the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is shown by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: También puede configurar cuándo la navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] se muestra estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La entrada más reciente en la parte posterior de historial de navegación puede quitarse mediante una llamada a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> no almacena una instancia de un objeto contenido en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> crea una nueva instancia del objeto de contenido cada vez que se navega mediante el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Este comportamiento está diseñado para evitar el consumo excesivo de memoria cuando se navegue a números grandes y grandes fragmentos de contenido.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, no se recuerda el estado del contenido en un panel de navegación a la siguiente.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] proporciona varias técnicas que puede almacenar una parte de estado para una parte del contenido en el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: Usar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>, también puede recordar varios conjuntos de estado para una instancia de página única.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is one of two navigators in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], the other being <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> es uno de dos exploradores en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)], el otro es <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.

trans-unit.source: Essentially, navigator is a class supports navigation and navigation history.
trans-unit.target: En esencia, navegador es que una clase admite la navegación y el historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience.
trans-unit.target: Visualmente, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] usar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] como un explorador, para proporcionar una experiencia de usuario integrada.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the navigator; the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and the navigation history that is managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] utilizar realmente <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> como el navegador; la <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> propiedad de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)] ejecuta en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] devolverá una referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>y el historial de navegación que está administrado por el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> se integra con el historial de navegación que está administrado por [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: **Content Model:** <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> can contain content such as text, images, or panels.
trans-unit.target: **Modelo de contenido:** <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> es un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, lo que significa que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> pueden incluir contenido como texto, imágenes o paneles.

trans-unit.source: Also, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is a root element and, consequently, cannot be part of another element's content.
trans-unit.target: Además, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> es un elemento raíz y, por lo tanto, no pueden formar parte del contenido de otro elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the content model for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, see [WPF Content Model](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el modelo de contenido <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, consulte [modelo de contenido de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/wpf-content-model.md).

trans-unit.source: Customizing the NavigationWindow Control
trans-unit.target: Personalizar el Control de NavigationWindow

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar la misma configuración de propiedad a varios <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> controles, utilice la <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Puede modificar el valor predeterminado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> para dar al control una apariencia única.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de cómo crear un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, consulte [personalizar la apariencia de un Control existente mediante la creación de un elemento ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, see [NavigationWindow Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para ver los elementos y los Estados que son específicos de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, consulte [NavigationWindow estilos y plantillas](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/navigationwindow-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de dependencia para este control se pueden establecer el estilo predeterminado del control.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Si se establece una propiedad de un estilo predeterminado, puede cambiar la propiedad de su valor predeterminado cuando el control aparece en la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: El estilo predeterminado se determina por el tema del escritorio que se utiliza cuando se ejecuta la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [temas de WPF predeterminado](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: Establecer una propiedad visual solo tendrá un efecto si esa propiedad está presente en ambos <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> control de la plantilla predeterminada y se establece mediante una.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Puede encontrar una lista de propiedades visuales en la sección "Cambiar la estructura Visual de un Control" en [personalizar la apariencia de un Control existente mediante la creación de un elemento ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo crear una clase <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: for permission for this object to call unsafe native methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener permiso para este objeto llamar a métodos nativos no seguros.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeración asociada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> que representa el estado definido por la aplicación asociado a una parte concreta del contenido.

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega una entrada al historial de retroceso de navegación que contiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is <see langword="null" />, and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object isn't returned from <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState.GetContentState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> es <see langword="null" /> y no se devuelve ningún objeto del objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> desde <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState.GetContentState" />.

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: Objeto secundario que se va a agregar.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un objeto secundario.

trans-unit.source: when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: cuando se llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: This prevents content from being added to <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esto evita que se agregue contenido a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> mediante [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Texto que se va a agregar al objeto.

trans-unit.source: Adds text to the object.
trans-unit.target: Agrega texto al objeto.

trans-unit.source: if the text parameter value contains non-whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: si el valor del parámetro de texto contiene caracteres sin espacios en blanco.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that you use to enumerate the entries in back navigation history for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que se usa para enumerar las entradas del historial de retroceso de navegación de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> if at least one entry has been added to back navigation history, or <see langword="null" /> if there are not entries or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Es <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> si al menos se ha agregado una entrada al historial de retroceso de navegación o es <see langword="null" /> si no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de retroceso de navegación o si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> no dispone de su propio historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack%2A> include whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: Las entradas devueltas por <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack%2A> incluyen contenido completo, navegaciones de fragmentos y estado personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de retroceso de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; <see langword="false" /> if there are no entries in back navigation history or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de retroceso de navegación; es <see langword="false" /> si no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de retroceso de navegación o si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> no tiene su propio historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si hay al menos una entrada en el historial de avance de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; <see langword="false" /> if there are no entries in forward navigation history, or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si al menos hay una entrada en el historial de avance de navegación; <see langword="false" /> si no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de avance de navegación o si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> no tiene su propio historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido al que se navegó por última vez.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] para el contenido que se navegó en último lugar, si se navegó utilizando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; en caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that you use to enumerate the entries in back navigation history for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que se usa para enumerar las entradas del historial de retroceso de navegación de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> if at least one entry has been added to forward navigation history, or null if there are no entries or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Es <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> si se ha agregado al menos una entrada al historial de avance de navegación o es null si no hay ninguna entrada o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> no dispone de su propio historial de navegación.

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack%2A> include whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: Las entradas devueltas por <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack%2A> incluyen contenido completo, navegaciones de fragmentos y estado personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Se genera cuando comienza la navegación a un fragmento del contenido, lo que ocurre de inmediato, si el fragmento deseado está en el contenido actual, o una vez cargado el contenido de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] de origen, si el fragmento deseado está en un contenido diferente.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent item in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Navega al elemento más reciente del historial de retroceso de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack" /> is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack" /> cuando no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de navegación hacia atrás.

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent item in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Navega al elemento más reciente del historial de avance de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward" /> is called when there are no entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward" /> cuando no hay ninguna entrada en el historial de avance de navegación.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se ha cargado, analizado y comenzado a representar el contenido al que se navegó.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to the specified source content.
trans-unit.target: Navega de forma asincrónica al contenido de origen especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contiene el contenido al que navegar.

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: Navega de forma asincrónica al contenido incluido en un objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo navegar al contenido que está contenida en un objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> inicializado con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido deseado.

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Navega asincrónicamente a un contenido especificado por un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] can be either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] puede ser absoluta o relativa.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea [Empaquetar URI en WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method to navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> método para navegar hasta una [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contiene el contenido al que navegar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contiene datos que se van a utilizar para procesar durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object, and passes an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Navega de forma asincrónica al contenido incluido en un objeto y pasa un objeto que contiene datos que se van a utilizar para procesar durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> inicializado con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido deseado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contiene datos que se van a utilizar para procesar durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: Navega asincrónicamente al contenido de origen que se encuentra en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] y pasa un objeto con los datos que se van a usar para el procesamiento durante la navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si no se cancela ninguna navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se ha encontrado el contenido al que se navega y ese contenido está disponible en la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" />, aunque no haya terminado de cargarse.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se solicita una nueva navegación.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error is raised while navigating to the requested content.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se genera un error mientras se navega por el contenido solicitado.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.
trans-unit.target: Se produce periódicamente durante una descarga y ofrece información sobre el progreso de la exploración.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> that is used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> to provide navigation services to its content.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> usa para proporcionar servicios de navegación a su contenido.

trans-unit.source: The navigation service used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Servicio de navegación utilizado por <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to provide navigation services to content that is hosted by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> usa un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> para proporcionar servicios de navegación al contenido hospedado por <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationService%2A> property is useful for code in a custom <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>, to handle navigation events, for example.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationService%2A> propiedad es útil para el código en un personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> para obtener una referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>, para controlar los eventos de navegación, por ejemplo.

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>, should use the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: Contenido que se hospeda en un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>, debe utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad para obtener una referencia a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading" /> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se llama al método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading" /> o cuando se solicita una nueva navegación mientras hay una navegación en curso.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the template generation for the visual tree is created.
trans-unit.target: Se le llama cuando se crea la generación de la plantilla para el árbol visual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Window.Closed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Window.Closed" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.OnClosed%2A> releases the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> object that it is using to manage navigation, before raising <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.OnClosed%2A> Libera la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> objeto que está usando para administrar la navegación, antes de generar <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea y devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método invalida <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: Recarga el contenido actual.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Refresh%2A> method to reload the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo llamar a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Refresh%2A> método para volver a cargar el contenido de un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: Quita la entrada más reciente del diario del historial de retroceso de navegación.

trans-unit.source: The most recent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> más reciente del historial de retroceso de navegación, si lo hay.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with default Internet zone permission set).
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> aísla el contenido externo de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] en un recinto de seguridad de confianza parcial (con el conjunto de permisos de la zona Internet predeterminado).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el contenido se aísla en un recinto de seguridad de confianza parcial; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (for more information, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: El contenido externo es [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] contenido que no se incluye en una aplicación como un archivo de recursos o un archivo de contenido (para obtener más información, consulte [recursos de la aplicación de WPF, contenido y archivos de datos](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent%2A> is true, and the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default Internet zone permission set.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent%2A> es true y el contenido de la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> es externo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] archivo, el contenido se carga en un recinto de seguridad de confianza parcial que se limita a la predeterminada conjunto de permisos de zona de Internet.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the external content is loaded into a separate process.
trans-unit.target: Además, el contenido externo se carga en un proceso independiente.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (for more information, see <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>).
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto, el contenido externo se aísla y no tiene acceso a los recursos del ámbito de la aplicación, como diccionarios de recursos (para obtener más información, consulte <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> contains external content only when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> contiene externo contenido sólo cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> propiedad está establecida en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para una referencia externa [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] archivo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> content that is provided using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> contenido que se proporciona mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> propiedad se considera contenido interno y, posteriormente, no está aislada.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent" /> is set when an application is executing in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Se establece <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent" /> cuando una aplicación se está ejecutando en confianza parcial.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Indica si la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> debe persistir.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el valor de propiedad ha cambiado con respecto a su valor predeterminado; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: Esto `ShouldSerialize` se proporciona el método porque el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> propiedad no tiene un valor predeterminado simple.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica si la propiedad ha cambiado respecto de su valor predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: You typically call this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Se suele llamar a este método si ya está desarrollando un diseñador para el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> o desarrollar su propio control que incorpore el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> shows its navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" /> muestra su [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] de navegación.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se muestra la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] de navegación; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: To aid back and forward navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> automatically displays a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: Para facilitar la navegación hacia delante y hacia atrás <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> muestra automáticamente una navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is displayed whether or not navigation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Navegación [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] se muestra si no se ha producido la navegación.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido actual o el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del nuevo contenido al que se navega actualmente.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del contenido actual o el contenido al que se navega actualmente.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] can be either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] puede ser absoluta o relativa.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea [Empaquetar URI en WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Información sobre propiedades de dependencia

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propiedades de metadatos establecidos en `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo navegar hasta una [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] estableciendo el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad de dependencia <see cref="P:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source" />.

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: Detiene la descarga de contenido para la solicitud de navegación actual.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading%2A> stops the download of the requested content, and causes the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading%2A> detiene la descarga del contenido solicitado y hace que el <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped> evento.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Vea <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading%2A> method to stop navigation to content before it has finished being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo llamar a la <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading%2A> método para detener la navegación al contenido antes de haya terminado de descarga.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el identificador uniforme de recursos (URI) base del contexto actual.

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the current context.
trans-unit.target: El URI base del contexto actual.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>.
